description:
Tube drivers have been offered a four-day week by Sadiq Khan’s Transport for London in return for calling off strikes. Add that to their 43 days holiday a year and £70k salary.

The post Tube Drivers Offered Four-Day Week by Sadiq Khan’s TfL to Call Off Strikes appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tube Drivers Offered Four-Day Week by Sadiq Khan’s TfL to Call Off Strikes

description:
Asda's Chairman has hit out at Rachel Reeves's "very, very damaging" Budget, warning the tax rises will force the supermarket to look closely at how many workers it can afford to employ.

The post Asda Chief Slams Reeves’s “Very, Very Damaging” Budget appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Asda Chief Slams Reeves’s “Very, Very Damaging” Budget

description:
Stephen Fry, Tom Holland and Ian McEwan are among a group of over two dozen top authors who have signed a letter telling the Government to end "cancel culture" by implementing the university Free Speech Act without delay.

The post Stephen Fry, Tom Holland and Ian McEwan Among Authors Telling Government to End Cancel Culture by Implementing University Free Speech Act Without Delay appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Stephen Fry, Tom Holland and Ian McEwan Among Authors Telling Government to End Cancel Culture by Implementing University Free Speech Act Without Delay

description:
The U.K. Health Security Agency has launched a "climate mental health distress" project. It's absurd, says Chris Morrison. They spend taxpayer money alarming people and then they spend even more trying to soothe them.

The post UKHSA Launches “Climate Mental Health Distress” Project With Taxpayer Money appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: UKHSA Launches “Climate Mental Health Distress” Project With Taxpayer Money

description:
Will Donald Trump kill Net Zero, asks Ben Pile. Yes. But more precisely Net Zero will kill Net Zero. Because no one wants to become Germany, with its headlong rush into deindustrialisation, least of all China and the USA.

The post Will President Trump Kill Net Zero? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Will President Trump Kill Net Zero?

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
